products.name: Ice Skates
products.description: These high-quality ice skates are perfect for recreational and competitive skating. They feature a durable and comfortable design that will keep you skating for hours.

products.name: Snowboard
products.description: This premium snowboard is perfect for riders of all levels. With a lightweight design and high-performance materials, you'll be carving up the mountain in no time.

products.name: Hiking Boots
products.description: These rugged hiking boots are built to handle any terrain. With a waterproof design and sturdy construction, they'll keep your feet comfortable and dry on even the toughest hikes.

products.name: Tennis Racquet
products.description: Take your game to the next level with this high-quality tennis racquet. Featuring a lightweight design and advanced materials, it's the perfect choice for players of all levels.

products.name: Golf Clubs
products.description: These premium golf clubs are designed to help you improve your game. With advanced materials and a custom fit, you'll be hitting longer, straighter shots in no time.

products.name: Basketball
products.description: Take your game to the next level with this high-quality basketball. It features a durable rubber construction and provides excellent grip and control.

products.name: Swimming Goggles
products.description: These comfortable and leak-proof swimming goggles are perfect for both recreational and competitive swimmers. They provide excellent visibility and protect your eyes from chlorine.

products.name: Baseball Glove
products.description: This high-quality baseball glove is perfect for players of all skill levels. It is made from top-grain leather and features a comfortable and durable design.
